title: Authorizes the state to acquire from the federal government the Montrose VA
summary: Authorizes the state to acquire from the federal government the Franklin Delano Roosevelt campus of the department of veterans affairs Hudson Valley health care system at Montrose.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to authorizing the state to acquire from the federal government the Franklin Delano Roosevelt campus of the department of veterans affairs Hudson Valley health care system at Montrose
